title: Wanna swap Shag’s, but I get the pretty one!
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: Wanna swap Shag’s, but I get the pretty one!
posts.post_content:
Hey all,
Looking to upgrade my SGC 2 Shag to a 3~4. Need an OMSL back on it though. I can make up the difference in cash or trade with raw or graded HOFers.

Let me know if any interest,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url] or PM
